content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal extraction point at position(y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position y1)

### Iron plate production facility at position(z)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position z1)

### Iron gear wheel crafting station
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position a1) that requires iron-plate and iron-gear-wheel

### Assembling Machine 1 crafting station
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position a2) that requires iron-plate, iron-gear-wheel, and electronic-circuit

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to missing ingredients
- Ensure that you have the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, iron-plate is necessary for crafting iron-gear-wheel and assembling machine.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
